DataElement.preferredName: Diagnostic Imaging First Bone Scan Post Week Nine Assessment Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The yes/no indicator related to the first bone scan that occurs after week 9.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Diagnostic Imaging First Bone Scan Post Week Nine Assessment
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Information related to the first bone scan that occurs after week 9.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Any method that uses a visual display of structural or functional patterns of organs or tissues for diagnostic evaluation..

Concepts.definition: Any method that uses a visual display of structural or functional patterns of organs or tissues for diagnostic evaluation.

Property.preferredName: First Bone Scan Post Week Nine Assessment
Property.preferredDefinition: Preceding all others in time or space or degree.:A nuclear imaging method used to evaluate pathological bone metabolism.:Happening at a time subsequent to a reference time; later in time or order.:Any period of seven consecutive days.:A natural number greater than 8 and less than 10 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of nine and one.:The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.

Concepts.definition: Preceding all others in time or space or degree.
A nuclear imaging method used to evaluate pathological bone metabolism.
Happening at a time subsequent to a reference time; later in time or order.
Any period of seven consecutive days.
A natural number greater than 8 and less than 10 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of nine and one.
The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.
